summary: After a battle with a high-tech villain named, Saiko-Tek, the Teen Titans travel to the city of Tokyo where they find themselves embroiled in a conflict with an ancient enemy.
cast: Greg Cipes|Scott Menville|Khary Payton|Tara Strong|Hynden Walch|Robert Ito|Janice Kawaye|Yuri Lowenthal|Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa|Keone Young
director: Directors: Michael Chang, Ben Jones | 1 more credit »
title: Teen Titans: Trouble in Tokyo
